settings.title: Welch Allyn Q1 2024 Rebates (Up to $500 per item)
settings.promo_details: Purchase qualifying Welch Allyn products between January 1 - March 31, 2024 and receive up to a $500 rebate per item. Qualifying items include Welch Allyn Green Series 777 Integrated Wall System, Connex Spot Monitor, Spot Vital Signs 4400 Device, CP 150 Resting ECG, ELI 280 Resting ECG, Diagnostic Cardiology Suite, RetinaVue 700 Imager, and Spot Vision Screener.
settings.redemption: Offer available on eligible purchases made January 1 - March 31, 2024. To be eligible for offer, customer must purchase qualifying Welch Allyn products identified in this document and provide proof of Welch Allyn purchase as indicated on the redemption form found at www.hillrom.com/2024rebate. All information must be submitted via the online redemption process by July 31, 2024. All customers must submit a completed W-9. Promotion valid in U.S. only to primary care medical facilities, Long Term Care Facilities, and Ambulatory Surgery Centers. Distributor stocking orders do not qualify. Please allow 12 weeks for receipt of rebate. Promotion cannot be combined with any other promotion, offer, coupon, enhanced discount or special pricing arrangement; some exclusions may apply.

settings.title: Welch Allyn Spot Vision Screener Upgrade $1,000 Rebate
settings.promo_details: Purchase a new Welch Allyn Spot Vision Screener (model number VS100S-B or VS100SH-B) between January 1, 2023 - December 31, 2023 and provide proof of purchase, W-9, photo of trade-in device with serial number or UPC label visible as indicated on the redemption form to receive a $1,000 rebate. Customers do not need to send in their old devices.
settings.redemption: Vision screeners eligible for trade in include: Welch Allyn SureSight Vision Screener, Welch Allyn Spot Vision Screener (2.0 model), PediaVision, GoCheck Kids, Plusoptix, MTI, Topcon, Retinomax, Titmus V Series, Stereo Optical Vision Screeners, Canon, Reichert, Marco and/or iScreen brands. Offer valid from January 1, 2023 - December 31, 2023. To be eligible for offer, customer must purchase a new Spot Vision Screener (model number VS100S-B or VS100SH-B) and provide proof of purchase, W-9, photo of trade-in device with serial number or UPC label visible as indicated on the redemption form found at hillrom.com/svsupgrade. All information must be submitted via the online redemption process by February 15, 2025. Offer cannot be combined with any other offer, discount or GPO contract pricing. Some exclusions may apply. Valid for U.S. customers only. Distributor stocking orders do not qualify. All submissions require a W-9, proof of purchase of new Spot Vision Screener and photo of trade-in device with serial number visible. Please allow 12 weeks for receipt of rebate check. Customers do not need to send in their old devices.
